member.name: PARAMDESC
member.summary: Contains information needed for transferring a structure element, parameter, or function return value between processes.

member.name: PARAMDESC.pparamdescex
member.summary: The default value for the parameter, if PARAMFLAG_FHASDEFAULT is specified in wParamFlags.

member.name: PARAMDESC.wParamFlags
member.summary: The parameter flags. See PARAMFLAG Constants.
